definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: The cost of living figures out at $300。
But that is the effect of relative dollar depreciation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这却是美元相对贬值的实际结果。

sentences.english: Everyone has to try to contribute $10 from money that we have earned ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都必须努力从自己挣到的钱里拿出十美元捐献。

sentences.english: I was done out of $20 in the shop this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我在商店里被骗走了20美元。

sentences.english: But the dollar's unity or reunification of the rentier war is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 但是美元统一或食利者的统一战争，是必然出现。

sentences.english: B：We want to open a US dollar account with your bank.
sentences.chinese: 我们想在贵行开一个美元账户。

sentences.english: In flush times, the convenience of buying a bottle of water seemed to justify its $1-plus price.
sentences.chinese: 购买了一瓶水的方便似乎证明了其1美元以上的价格。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: I booked two tickets_costing_8 dollars each.
sentences.chinese: 我买了两张八美元的票。

sentences.english: The democracy of one dollar one vote is not attractive.
sentences.chinese: “一美元一票”的民主制并不具有吸引力。

sentences.english: The scheme has a present value of nearly $270, 000 to a new recipient.
sentences.chinese: 一位新的补助成员现在可以领取近27万美元。

sentences.english: B:Our rates are $10.00 a day and 10 cents a mile.
sentences.chinese: 我们的租费一天10美元，每英里10美分钱。

sentences.english: The money was counted. The sum amounted to a little over twelve thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 29钱被过了数，总共有一万二千块美元。

sentences.english: The hotel charged 150 dollors a day,the meal is not included.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆一天收费一百五十美元，不包括膳食。

sentences.english: The jury sided with Christofferson-Titchbourne, awarding her thirty-nine million dollars.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团站在朱莉一边，判她应得3900万美元。

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 许多技术人员的玩具钱包友好在30美元以下。

definition: Japanese yen (unit of currency)/also written 日圓|日圆
